column4: anyone care to assist with 8.10 and connecting via hostname?  I can only do it via IP since upgrading to 8.10
did standard setup with 8.10 Desktop, want to get webmin running.  Presently have static IP w/ local router to cable modem
from one host to 8.10 desktop host
i just make /etc/hosts files with the hostname/static ip. for all the machines on my network. Thats the easy way at least
